thread.title: The worst experience at one of the best location/district in Paris
thread.title_full: The worst experience at one of the best location/district in Paris - Review of Le Relais du Louvre, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: saeedhasan
title: The worst experience at one of the best location/district in Paris
text:
Not recommended at all to anyone in this World!!
The pictures of the hotel given are too deceiving, no relation with actual hotel
staff especially in night is zero professional, they don't have any paper to sign at the time of check in hence you can be charged twice as happened with me.
If by curse of anyone staying there, please get everything in writing at the time of check in
